trans-unit.source: Provides simple functionality for enumerating resources for a component or object.
The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ComponentResourceManager"></xref> class is a <xref href="System.Resources.ResourceManager"></xref>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ComponentResourceManager"></xref> class with default values.
Creates a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ComponentResourceManager"></xref> that looks up resources in satellite assemblies based on information from the specified <xref href="System.Type"></xref>.
A <xref href="System.Type"></xref> from which the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ComponentResourceManager"></xref> derives all information for finding resource files.
Applies a resource's value to the corresponding property of the object.
This method examines all the resources for the current culture used in the development environment.
It attempts to find a resource with a key in the format of `objectName.propertyName`, where `objectName` is passed in as a parameter and `propertyName` is the name of a property.
It will then apply that resource's `value` to the corresponding property of the object.
If there is no matching property, the resource will be ignored.
An <xref href="System.Object"></xref> that contains the property value to be applied.
A <xref href="System.String"></xref> that contains the name of the object to look up in the resources.
value or objectName is `null`.
Applies a resource's value to the corresponding property of the object.
This method examines all the resources for the provided culture.
If `culture` is `null`, the current culture is assumed.

The <xref:System.ComponentModel.ComponentResourceManager.ApplyResources%2A> method attempts to find a resource with a key in the format of `objectName.propertyName`, where `objectName` is passed in as a parameter and `propertyName` is the name of a property.
It will then apply that resource's `value` to the corresponding property of the object.
If there is no matching property, the resource will be ignored.
An <xref href="System.Object"></xref> that contains the property value to be applied.
A <xref href="System.String"></xref> that contains the name of the object to look up in the resources.
The culture for which to apply resources.
value or objectName is `null`.
